17140911Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image Resize(Image originalImage, int w, int h)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Original Image attributesDi2015NewLine    int originalWidth = originalImage.Width;Di2015NewLine    int originalHeight = originalImage.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Figure out the ratioDi2015NewLine    double ratioX = (double)w / (double)originalWidth;Di2015NewLine    double ratioY = (double)h / (double)originalHeight;Di2015NewLine    // use whichever multiplier is smallerDi2015NewLine    double ratio = ratioX < ratioY ? ratioX : ratioY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we can get the new height and widthDi2015NewLine    int newHeight = Convert.ToInt32(originalHeight * ratio);Di2015NewLine    int newWidth = Convert.ToInt32(originalWidth * ratio);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Image thumbnail = new Bitmap(newWidth, newHeight);Di2015NewLine    Graphics graphic = Graphics.FromImage(thumbnail);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    graphic.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine    graphic.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine    graphic.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine    graphic.CompositingQuality = CompositingQuality.HighQuality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    graphic.Clear(Color.Transparent);Di2015NewLine    graphic.DrawImage(originalImage, 0, 0, newWidth, newHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return thumbnail;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17143571Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum PayoutResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UserNotFound,Di2015NewLine    Success,Di2015NewLine    FundsUnavailable,Di2015NewLine    DBErrorDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class UserProfileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public float Balance { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Username { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // other properties and domain logic you may haveDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Withdraw(PayoutModel model)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Balance >= model.Amount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Balance -= model.Amount;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PayoutServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IUserRepository userRepository;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PayoutService()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.userRepository = new UserRepository();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PayoutResult Payout(string userName, PayoutModel model)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var user = this.userRepository.GetAll().SingleOrDefault(u => u.Username == userName);Di2015NewLine        if (user == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return PayoutResult.UserNotFound;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // don't set the model properties until we're ok on the dbDi2015NewLine        bool hasWithdrawn = user.Withdraw(model);Di2015NewLine        if (hasWithdrawn && this.userRepository.SaveUser(user))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            model.Balance = user.Balance;Di2015NewLine            model.Amount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return PayoutResult.Success;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (hasWithdrawn)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return PayoutResult.DBError;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return PayoutResult.FundsUnavailable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17143571Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Payout(PayoutModel model)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ModelState.IsValid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = service.Payout(User.Identity.Name, model);Di2015NewLine        // This part should only be in the MVC project since it deals with Di2015NewLine        // how things should be presented to the userDi2015NewLine        switch (result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case PayoutResult.UserNotFound:Di2015NewLine                ViewBag.Message = "User not found";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case PayoutResult.Success:Di2015NewLine                ViewBag.Message = string.Format("Successfully withdraw {0:c}", model.Balance);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case PayoutResult.FundsUnavailable:Di2015NewLine                ViewBag.Message = "Insufficient funds";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }               Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View(model);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17143665Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void CleanRecords()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        string delimiter = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SQLActions.Initialize();Di2015NewLine        SQLActions.SQL_Open();Di2015NewLine        MySqlDataReader cashData = SQLActions.SQL_Query("SELECT `cash`.`id`, SUM(`cash`.`income_money`) AS `income_money`, `cash_data`.`total` FROM `cash_data` JOIN `cash` ON `cash`.`cash_data_id` = `cash_data`.`id` WHERE `user`='0' AND `cash_data`.`paymentterm_id`='0' OR `cash_data`.`paymentterm_id`='1' GROUP BY `cash_data_id`");Di2015NewLine        while(cashData.Read()){Di2015NewLine            if(cashData["income_money"].ToString() == cashData["total"].ToString()){Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(delimiter);Di2015NewLine                builder.Append("'" + cashData["id"].ToString() + "'");Di2015NewLine                delimiter = ",";       Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SQLActions.SQL_Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UpdateRecords(builder.ToString());  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void UpdateRecords(string rowIDs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SQLActions.Initialize();Di2015NewLine    SQLActions.SQL_Open();Di2015NewLine    SQLActions.SQL_NonQuery("UPDATE `cash_data` SET `end_date`='" + GetMeDate() + "', `user`='1' WHERE `id` IN (" + rowIDs + ")";Di2015NewLine    SQLActions.SQL_Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17143979Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var p = Process.GetProcessById(3484);Di2015NewLine        var h = p.MainWindowHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string s = GetWindowTextTimeout(h, 100 /*msec*/);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("User32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public unsafe static extern int SendMessageTimeout(Di2015NewLine      IntPtr hWnd,Di2015NewLine      uint uMsg,Di2015NewLine      uint wParam,Di2015NewLine      StringBuilder lParam,Di2015NewLine      uint fuFlags,Di2015NewLine      uint uTimeout,Di2015NewLine      void* lpdwResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int WM_GETTEXT = 0x000D;Di2015NewLine    const int WM_GETTEXTLENGTH = 0x000E;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static unsafe string GetWindowTextTimeout(IntPtr hWnd, uint timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length;Di2015NewLine        if (SendMessageTimeout(hWnd, WM_GETTEXTLENGTH, 0, null, 2, timeout, &length) == 0) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (length == 0) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(length + 1);  // leave room for null-terminatorDi2015NewLine        if (SendMessageTimeout(hWnd, WM_GETTEXT, (uint)sb.Capacity, sb, 2, timeout, null) == 0) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17153272Di2015UniqueSeparator  Note: RFC 1945 and RFC 2068 specify that the client is not allowedDi2015NewLine  to change the method on the redirected request.  However, mostDi2015NewLine  existing user agent implementations treat 302 as if it were a 303Di2015NewLine  response, performing a GET on the Location field-value regardlessDi2015NewLine  of the original request method. The status codes 303 and 307 haveDi2015NewLine  been added for servers that wish to make unambiguously clear whichDi2015NewLine  kind of reaction is expected of the client.Di2015NewLine
17153272Di2015UniqueSeparator  Note: Many pre-HTTP/1.1 user agents do not understand the 303Di2015NewLine  status. When interoperability with such clients is a concern, theDi2015NewLine  302 status code may be used instead, since most user agents reactDi2015NewLine  to a 302 response as described here for 303.Di2015NewLine

17153272Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SoapHttpClientProtocolWithRedirect :Di2015NewLine    System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocolDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override System.Net.WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_redirectFixed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FixRedirect(new Uri(this.Url));Di2015NewLine            _redirectFixed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.GetWebRequest(new Uri(this.Url));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.GetWebRequest(uri);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _redirectFixed = false;Di2015NewLine    private void FixRedirect(Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLine        var response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (response.StatusCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case HttpStatusCode.Redirect:Di2015NewLine            case HttpStatusCode.TemporaryRedirect:Di2015NewLine            case HttpStatusCode.MovedPermanently:Di2015NewLine                this.Url = new Uri(uri, response.Headers["Location"]).ToString();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17155517Di2015UniqueSeparatorToObservableCollection
17155517Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> ListPairs<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   using (var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       if (!enumerator.MoveNext()) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       T previous = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine       while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          T current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine          yield return new Tuple<T, T>(previous, current);Di2015NewLine          previous = current;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic ObservableCollection<Appointment> FillGaps()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var gaps = ListPairs(this.Appointments.OrderByDescending(s => s.EndDate))Di2015NewLine      .Where(pair => (pair.Item1.StartDate.Value - pair.Item2.EndDate.Value).Days > 1)Di2015NewLine      .Select(pair => new AppointmentDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         StartDate = pair.Item2.EndDate.Value.AddDays(1),Di2015NewLine         EndDate = pair.Item1.StartDate.Value.AddDays(-1),Di2015NewLine         IsCurrent = false,Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // NB: Assumes "this.Appointments" is a cheap call;Di2015NewLine   // Also assumes you don't need the results in any particular order.Di2015NewLine   return this.Appointments.Concat(gaps).ToObservableCollection();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17155936Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T DeepClone<T>(T original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(T).IsSerializable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The type must be serializable.", "original");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(original, null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var formatter = new BinaryFormatterDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Context = new StreamingContext(StreamingContextStates.Clone)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        formatter.Serialize(stream, original);Di2015NewLine        stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (T) formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17156146Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] getBytes<T>(T str) where T:structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int size = Marshal.SizeOf(str);Di2015NewLine    byte[] arr = new byte[size];Di2015NewLine    IntPtr ptr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(size);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.StructureToPtr(str, ptr, true);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(ptr, arr, 0, size);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.FreeHGlobal(ptr);Di2015NewLine    return arr;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17158308Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static IEnumerable<T> MoveSection<T>(this IEnumerable<T> @this, int insertionPoint, int startIndex, int endIndex)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var counter = 0;Di2015NewLine      var numElements = endIndex - startIndex;Di2015NewLine      var range = Enumerable.Range(startIndex, numElements);Di2015NewLine      foreach(var i in @this)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          if (counter == insertionPoint) {Di2015NewLine              foreach(var j in @this.Skip(startIndex).Take(numElements)) {Di2015NewLine                  yield return j;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          if (!range.Contains(counter)) {Di2015NewLine              yield return i;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          counter++;Di2015NewLine      }             Di2015NewLine      //The insertion point might have been after the entire list:Di2015NewLine      if (counter++ == insertionPoint) {Di2015NewLine          foreach(var j in @this.Skip(startIndex).Take(numElements)) {Di2015NewLine              yield return j;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17170090Di2015UniqueSeparator/* includesDi2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing Newtonsoft.Json;Di2015NewLineusing Newtonsoft.Json.Linq;Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the original JSON stringDi2015NewLineString jsonString = "[{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(0,0,255)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Leonardo - $0.99\\",\\"data\\":[[1336485655241,0.99],[1336566333236,0.99],[1336679536073,0.99],[1336706394834,0.99],[1336774593068,0.99],[1366284992043,0.99]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(128,0,128)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Donatello - $0.25\\",\\"data\\":[[1361061084420,0.23],[1366102471587,0.25],[1366226367262,0.25],[1366284992043,0.25]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(255,0,0)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Raphael - $0.15\\",\\"data\\":[[1327305600000,0.15],[1365583220422,0.15],[1365669396241,0.15],[1365669396241,0.15],[1365753433493,0.15],[1366284992043,0.15]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(255,165,0)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Michelangelo - $0.14\\",\\"data\\":[1366284992043,0.14]}]";Di2015NewLine// The parsed result (using Json.NET)Di2015NewLinevar json = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(jsonString);Di2015NewLine// Grab all the "ninjas"Di2015NewLineString[] ninjas = (json as JArray).Select (x => x.Value<String>("ninja")).ToArray();Di2015NewLine// Begin aggregating the resultsDi2015NewLineIDictionary<String, Double> result = ninjas.ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine    x => x.Substring(0, x.IndexOf(" - ")),Di2015NewLine    y => {Di2015NewLine        Double d;Di2015NewLine        return Double.TryParse(y.Substring(y.IndexOf(" - ") + 4), out d) ? d : default(Double);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine);Di2015NewLine

17170090Di2015UniqueSeparator-
17170090Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ParentObjDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String bandanaColor;Di2015NewLine    public String ninja;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public String NinjaNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String ninja = this.ninja ?? String.Empty;Di2015NewLine            Int32 i = ninja.IndexOf(" - ");Di2015NewLine            return i != -1 ? ninja.Substring(0, i) : String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Double NinjaPriceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String ninja = this.ninja ?? String.Empty;Di2015NewLine            Double price;Di2015NewLine            Int32 i = ninja.IndexOf(" - $");Di2015NewLine            return i != -1 && Double.TryParse(ninja.Substring(i + 4), out price) ? price : default(Double);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // the original JSON stringDi2015NewLine    String jsonString = "[{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(0,0,255)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Leonardo - $0.99\\",\\"data\\":[[1336485655241,0.99],[1336566333236,0.99],[1336679536073,0.99],[1336706394834,0.99],[1336774593068,0.99],[1366284992043,0.99]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(128,0,128)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Donatello - $0.25\\",\\"data\\":[[1361061084420,0.23],[1366102471587,0.25],[1366226367262,0.25],[1366284992043,0.25]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(255,0,0)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Raphael - $0.15\\",\\"data\\":[[1327305600000,0.15],[1365583220422,0.15],[1365669396241,0.15],[1365669396241,0.15],[1365753433493,0.15],[1366284992043,0.15]]},{\\"bandanaColor\\":\\"rgb(255,165,0)\\",\\"ninja\\":\\"Michelangelo - $0.14\\",\\"data\\":[1366284992043,0.14]}];";Di2015NewLine    // The parsed result (using Json.NET in to our custom object)Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<ParentObj> json = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<IEnumerable<ParentObj>>(jsonString.TrimEnd(';'));Di2015NewLine    // the use Linq to create a dictionary from our custom gettersDi2015NewLine    IDictionary<String, Double> result = json.ToDictionary (x => x.NinjaName, y => y.NinjaPrice);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17171348Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerations.GetDescription
17171348Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static String ToDescription<TEnum>(this TEnum e) where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(TEnum);Di2015NewLine        if (!type.IsEnum) throw new InvalidOperationException("type must be an enum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var memInfo = type.GetMember(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine        if (memInfo != null & memInfo.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var descAttr = memInfo[0].GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine            if (descAttr != null && descAttr.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ((DescriptionAttribute)descAttr[0]).Description;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return e.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TEnum ToEnum<TEnum>(this String description) where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(TEnum);Di2015NewLine        if (!type.IsEnum) throw new InvalidOperationException("type must be an enum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var field in type.GetFields())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var descAttr = field.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine            if (descAttr != null && descAttr.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (((DescriptionAttribute)descAttr[0]).Description == description)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return (TEnum)field.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (field.Name == description)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (TEnum)field.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return default(TEnum); // or throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17172382Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ServiceRouter : IMyServicesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string ServiceURI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Routes data requests over the LAN if the client is connected locally or over a WCF service if the client is remote. Use this constructor to route data requests over the LAN.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms735103.aspxDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    public ServiceRouter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ServiceURI = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Routes data requests over the LAN if the client is connected locally or over a WCF service if the client is remote.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="serviceURI">Fully qualified URI of a WCF server if the user is remote.  Pass null if the user authenticated on the LAN (including using VPN)</param>Di2015NewLine    /// http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms735103.aspxDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    public ServiceRouter(string serviceURI)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ServiceURI = serviceURI;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Allocation> GetAllocations()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IMyServices client = GetClient();Di2015NewLine        var result = client.GetAllocations().ToList();Di2015NewLine        CloseClient(client);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      #region WCFClientDi2015NewLine    private IMyServices GetClient()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IMyServices _client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ServiceURI))Di2015NewLine            _client = new MYServices();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _client = ChannelFactory<IMyServices>.CreateChannel(new BasicHttpBinding(), new EndpointAddress(ServiceURI));Di2015NewLine            ((ICommunicationObject)_client).Open();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return _client;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CloseClient(IMyServices client)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ICommunicationObject wcfClient = client as ICommunicationObject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (wcfClient != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (wcfClient.State == CommunicationState.Faulted)Di2015NewLine                wcfClient.Abort();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                wcfClient.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            ((IDisposable)client).Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

BuildConfigurationDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public BuildConfiguration(XElement configuration)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // ReSharper disable 17175817Di2015UniqueSeparator /// <summary>Di2015NewLine /// Returns recently written File from the specified directory.Di2015NewLine /// If the directory does not exist or doesn't contain any file, null is returned.Di2015NewLine /// </summary>Di2015NewLine /// <param name="directoryInfo">Path of the directory that needs to be scanned</param>Di2015NewLine /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine public static string NewestFileofDirectory(string directoryPath )Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo directoryInfo  = new DirectoryInfo(directoryPath);Di2015NewLine    if (directoryInfo == null || !directoryInfo.Exists)Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     FileInfo[] files = directoryInfo.GetFiles();Di2015NewLine     DateTime recentWrite = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine     FileInfo recentFile = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     foreach (FileInfo file in files)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         if (file.LastWriteTime > recentWrite)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            recentWrite = file.LastWriteTime;Di2015NewLine            recentFile = file;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine         return recentFile.Name;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

17180515Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] PdfGeneratorAndPostProcessor()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] newPdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (var pdf = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine  using (var doc = new Document(iTextSharp.text.PageSize.A4))Di2015NewLine  using (PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, pdf))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // do stuff to the newly created doc...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doc.Close();Di2015NewLine    newPdf = pdf.GetBuffer();Di2015NewLine  }      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] postProcessedPdf;Di2015NewLine  var reader = new PdfReader(newPdf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (var pdf = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine  using (var stamper = new PdfStamper(reader, pdf))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var pageCount = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 1; i <= pageCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // do something on each page of the existing pdfDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stamper.Close();Di2015NewLine    postProcessedPdf = pdf.GetBuffer();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  reader.Close();Di2015NewLine  return postProcessedPdf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17180647Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Button_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = StartAndWaitProcess(@"some\\document\\path");Di2015NewLine    t.ContinueWith(dummy => b.Content = "process finished",Di2015NewLine                   TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTask StartAndWaitProcess(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var p = new Process();Di2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.FileName = path;Di2015NewLine    p.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine    p.Exited += (sender, args) => { tcs.SetResult(true); p.Dispose(); };Di2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(() => p.Start());Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17184090Di2015UniqueSeparator        string[] num = Regex.Split(textBox1.Text, @"\\-|\\+|\\*|\\/").Where(s => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(s)).ToArray(); // get Array for numbersDi2015NewLine        string[] op = Regex.Split(textBox1.Text, @"\\d{1,3}").Where(s => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(s)).ToArray(); // get Array for mathematical operators +,-,/,*Di2015NewLine        int numCtr = 0, lastVal=0; // number counter and last Value accumulatorDi2015NewLine        string lastOp = ""; // last OperatorDi2015NewLine        foreach (string n in num)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            numCtr++;Di2015NewLine            if (numCtr == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastVal = int.Parse(n); // if first loop lastVal will have the first numeric valueDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(lastOp)) // if last Operator not emptyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Do the mathematical computation and accumulationDi2015NewLine                    switch (lastOp) Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case "+":Di2015NewLine                            lastVal = lastVal + int.Parse(n);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "-":Di2015NewLine                            lastVal = lastVal - int.Parse(n);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "*":Di2015NewLine                            lastVal = lastVal * int.Parse(n);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "/":Di2015NewLine                            lastVal = lastVal + int.Parse(n);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int opCtr = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string o in op)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                opCtr++;Di2015NewLine                if (opCtr == numCtr) //will make sure it will get the next operatorDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lastOp = o;  // get the last operatorDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(lastVal.ToString());Di2015NewLine

17186287Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetExcelColumnName(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int d = index;Di2015NewLine        string name = "";Di2015NewLine        int mod;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (d > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mod = (d - 1) % 26;Di2015NewLine            name = Convert.ToChar('a' + mod).ToString() + name;Di2015NewLine            d = (int)((d - mod) / 26);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<string> GetExcelColumns(int n) {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return GetExcelColumnName(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = 1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in GetExcelColumns(900))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(i++ + ": " + item + " ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17186287Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetExcelColumnName
17186287Di2015UniqueSeparator//Suppose index = 1, `GetExcelColumnName` should return `"a"`.Di2015NewLine    d = 1Di2015NewLine    d > 0Di2015NewLine        mod = (d - 1) % 26; //mod now is 0Di2015NewLine        Convert.ToChar('a' + mod); // => That's 'a'Di2015NewLine        //name now is "a"Di2015NewLine        d = (d - mod) / 26 = (1 - 0) / 26 = 0 // d is now 0Di2015NewLine    //End of WhileDi2015NewLine    method returns "a"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Suppose index = 28, `GetExcelColumnName` should return `"ab"`.Di2015NewLine    d = 28Di2015NewLine    d > 0Di2015NewLine        mod = (d - 1) % 26; //mod now is 1 (27 modulo 26)Di2015NewLine        Convert.ToChar('a' + mod); // => That's 'b'Di2015NewLine        //name now is "b"Di2015NewLine        d = (d - mod) / 26 = (28 - 1) / 26 = 1 // d is now 1Di2015NewLine    d > 0Di2015NewLine        mod = (d - 1) % 26; //mod now is 0 (0 modulo 26)Di2015NewLine        Convert.ToChar('a' + mod); // => That's 'a'Di2015NewLine        //name now is "ab"Di2015NewLine        d = (d - mod) / 26 = (1 - 0) / 26 = 0 // d is now 0Di2015NewLine    //End of WhileDi2015NewLine    method returns "ab"Di2015NewLine

17186919Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Email(string htmlBody, string emailSubject) {Di2015NewLine  var mailMessage = new MailMessage("from@company.com", "to@company.com");Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.IsBodyHtml = true;Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.SubjectEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.BodyEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.Body = htmlBody;Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.Subject = emailSubject;Di2015NewLine  // embedd imagesDi2015NewLine  var imageUrls = new List<EmailImage>();Di2015NewLine  var regexImg = new Regex(@"<img[^>]+>", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine  var regexSrc = new Regex(@"src=[""](?<url>[^""]+)[""]", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine  mailMessage.Body = regexImg.Replace(mailMessage.Body, (matchImg) => {Di2015NewLine    var value = regexSrc.Replace(matchImg.Value, (matchSrc) => {Di2015NewLine      string url = matchSrc.Groups["url"].Value;Di2015NewLine      var image = imageUrls.Where(i => string.Compare(i.Url, url, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == 0).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine      if (image == null) {Di2015NewLine        image = new EmailImage { Url = url, MailID = Convert.ToString(imageUrls.Count) };Di2015NewLine        imageUrls.Add(image);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return string.Format(@"src=""cid:{0}""", image.MailID);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    return value;Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (imageUrls.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine    var htmlView = AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString(mailMessage.Body, null, "text/html");Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < imageUrls.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine      var request = WebRequest.Create(imageUrls[i].Url);Di2015NewLine      var response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine      var stream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine      var memoryStream = new MemoryStream((int)response.ContentLength);Di2015NewLine      CopyStream(stream, memoryStream);Di2015NewLine      memoryStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine      var imageLink = new LinkedResource(memoryStream, GetContentType(response.ContentType, imageUrls[i].Url));Di2015NewLine      imageLink.ContentId = imageUrls[i].MailID;Di2015NewLine      imageLink.TransferEncoding = System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding.Base64;Di2015NewLine      htmlView.LinkedResources.Add(imageLink);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    mailMessage.AlternateViews.Add(htmlView);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SmtpClient.Send(mailMessage);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17186919Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CopyStream(Stream input, Stream output) {Di2015NewLine  byte[] buffer = new byte[32768];Di2015NewLine  int read;Di2015NewLine  while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0) {Di2015NewLine    output.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetContentType(string serverContentType, string imageUrl) {Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(imageUrl))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("imageUrl");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ImageMimeType mimeType;Di2015NewLine  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(serverContentType)) {Di2015NewLine    serverContentType = serverContentType.ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine    mimeType = ImageMimeType.MimeTypes.Where(m => m.MimeType == serverContentType).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (mimeType != null) {Di2015NewLine      return mimeType.MimeType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string extension = Path.GetExtension(imageUrl).ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine  mimeType = ImageMimeType.MimeTypes.Where(m => m.FileExtension == extension).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine  if (mimeType != null) {Di2015NewLine    return mimeType.MimeType;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class EmailImage {Di2015NewLine  public string Url { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public string MailID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class ImageMimeType {Di2015NewLine  public string FileExtension { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine  public string MimeType { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine  public static List<ImageMimeType> MimeTypes = new List<ImageMimeType> {Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".png", MimeType = "image/png"},Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".jpe", MimeType = "image/jpeg" },Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".jpeg", MimeType = "image/jpeg" },Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".jpg", MimeType = "image/jpeg" },Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".gif", MimeType = "image/gif" },Di2015NewLine    new ImageMimeType { FileExtension = ".bmp", MimeType = "image/bmp" }Di2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17188009Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar orderedLines = File.ReadLines("timesBetweenStartToEnd.txt")Di2015NewLine    .Select(l =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int secondsIndex = l.LastIndexOf(" -> ");Di2015NewLine        int? sec = (int?)null;Di2015NewLine        if(secondsIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            secondsIndex += " -> ".Length;Di2015NewLine            int secondEndIndex = l.IndexOf(" Seconds", secondsIndex);Di2015NewLine            if (secondEndIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int length = secondEndIndex - secondsIndex;Di2015NewLine                string secondsPart = l.Substring(secondsIndex, length).Trim();Di2015NewLine                int seconds;Di2015NewLine                if (int.TryParse(secondsPart, out seconds))Di2015NewLine                    sec = (int?)seconds;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new { Line = l, Seconds = sec };Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine    .OrderBy(x => x.Seconds)Di2015NewLine    .Select(x => x.Line);Di2015NewLineFile.WriteAllLines("logTimes.txt", orderedLines);Di2015NewLine

17195967Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing Oracle.DataAccess.Client;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace execsqlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Simple Sql Executor for use in Batch files.Di2015NewLine    /// ExitCode = 0 on successDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static string _sql;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (CheckArgs(args))Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    ExecuteSql(args);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("execsql Ok");Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(_sql);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Environment.ExitCode = 2;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("ExecSql Encountered an Error");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(_sql);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ExecuteSql(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LoadSql(args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (OracleConnection conn = GetConnection(args))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                conn.Open();Di2015NewLine                OracleCommand cmd = new OracleCommand();Di2015NewLine                cmd.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cmd.CommandText = _sql;Di2015NewLine                cmd.ExecuteNonQuery(); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void LoadSql(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (args[3].StartsWith("/f=")) // not testedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder script = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                string fname = args[3].Split('=')[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] strings = File.ReadAllLines(fname);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach(string str in strings)Di2015NewLine                    script.Append(str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _sql = script.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _sql = args[3];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool CheckArgs(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (args.Count() == 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Invalid Number Of Arguments - Expected 4");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Use : execsql <dbServer> <dbUser> <dbPassword> <sql>");Di2015NewLine                Environment.ExitCode = 1;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static OracleConnection GetConnection(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            string connectionString = String.Format("Data Source={0};User ID={1};Password={2}", args[0], args[1], args[2]); Di2015NewLine            return new OracleConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17200032Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Dispatcher : MonoBehaviourDi2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Queue<Action> tasks = new Queue<Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dispatcher Instance = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Dispatcher()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Instance = new Dispatcher();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dispatcher()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void InvokeLater(Action task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (tasks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tasks.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void FixedUpdate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (tasks.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action task = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (tasks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (tasks.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task = tasks.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            task();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17209140Di2015UniqueSeparator[Flags]Di2015NewLineenum MyFlags : shortDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    None = 0,Di2015NewLine    Faulted = 1 << 0,Di2015NewLine    Tampered = 1 << 1,Di2015NewLine    Trouble = 1 << 2,Di2015NewLine    Bypassed = 1 << 3,Di2015NewLine    Inhibited = 1 << 4,Di2015NewLine    LowBattery = 1 << 5,Di2015NewLine    LossOfSupervision = 1 << 6,Di2015NewLine    AlarmMemory = 1 << 8,Di2015NewLine    BypassMemory = 1 << 9Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic bool IsSet(MyFlags value, MyFlags flag)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ((value & flag) == flag);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparatorshort
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyFlags
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyFlags value = ...Di2015NewLinebool isAlarmMemory = IsSet(value, MyFlags.AlarmMemory);Di2015NewLine
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool memoryProblem = IsSet(value, MyFlags.AlarmMemory | MyFlags.BypassMemory);Di2015NewLine
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn ((value & flag) == flag); // means "are all set"Di2015NewLinereturn ((value & flag) != 0); // means "is any set"Di2015NewLine
17209140Di2015UniqueSeparator// this is just some garbage that I'm pretending is a message fromDi2015NewLine// your module; I'm assuming the byte numbers in the image areDi2015NewLine// zero-based, so the two that we want are: \\/\\/\\/ (the 6,3)Di2015NewLinebyte[] data = { 12, 63, 113, 0, 13, 123, 14, 6, 3, 14, 15 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// and I'm assuming "byte 7" and "byte 8" (image) are zero-based;Di2015NewLine// MyFlags uses byte 7 *first*, so it is little-endian; we can get thatDi2015NewLine// via:Di2015NewLineshort flagsRaw = (short)(data[7] | (data[8] << 8));Di2015NewLineMyFlags flags = (MyFlags)flagsRaw;Di2015NewLine// flags has value Tampered | Trouble | AlarmMemory | BypassMemory,Di2015NewLine// which is what we expect for {6,3}Di2015NewLine

17209205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    System.Windows.Forms.Timer timer = new System.Windows.Forms.Timer();Di2015NewLine    timer.Tick += new EventHandler(timer_Tick);Di2015NewLine    timer.Interval = 1000;Di2015NewLine    timer.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17209205Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void timer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = dataTable.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine    if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int time;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            time = Convert.ToInt16(dataTable.Rows[i][2]);Di2015NewLine            if (time > 0)Di2015NewLine                dataTable.Rows[i][2] = time - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Red,Green,LawnGreen any..Di2015NewLine          Color newColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLine          Color actulaColor;            Di2015NewLine          //make an empty bitmap the same size as scrBitmapDi2015NewLine          Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(scrBitmap.Width, scrBitmap.Height);Di2015NewLine          for (int i = 0; i < scrBitmap.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             for (int j = 0; j < scrBitmap.Height; j++)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                //get the pixel from the scrBitmap imageDi2015NewLine                actulaColor = scrBitmap.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLine                // > 150 because.. 17210702Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns all numbers, between min and max inclusive, once in a random sequence.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineIEnumerable<int> UniqueRandom(int minInclusive, int maxInclusive)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> candidates = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = minInclusive; i <= maxInclusive; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        candidates.Add(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    while (candidates.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = rnd.Next(candidates.Count);Di2015NewLine        yield return candidates[index];Di2015NewLine        candidates.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17214236Di2015UniqueSeparator       private const string initVector = "tu89geji340t89u2";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private const int keysize = 256;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Encrypt(string Text, string Key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] plainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Text);Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(Key, null);Di2015NewLine            byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keysize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine            byte[] Encrypted = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(Encrypted);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Decrypt(string EncryptedText, string Key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] DeEncryptedText = Convert.FromBase64String(EncryptedText);Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(Key, null);Di2015NewLine            byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keysize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform decryptor = symmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(DeEncryptedText);Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine            byte[] plainTextBytes = new byte[DeEncryptedText.Length];Di2015NewLine            int decryptedByteCount = cryptoStream.Read(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(plainTextBytes, 0, decryptedByteCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17218875Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring output = GSMConverter.StringToGSMHexString("Hello World");Di2015NewLine// output = "48-65-6C-6C-6F-20-57-6F-72-6C-64"Di2015NewLine
17218875Di2015UniqueSeparator// Data/info taken from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GSM_03.38Di2015NewLinepublic static class GSMConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The index of the character in the string represents the indexDi2015NewLine    // of the character in the respective character setDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Basic Character SetDi2015NewLine    private const string BASIC_SET = Di2015NewLine            "@$\\n\\r_\\x1b !\\"#%&'()*+,-./0123456789:;<=>?" +Di2015NewLine            "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ`abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Basic Character Set Extension Di2015NewLine    private const string EXTENSION_SET =Di2015NewLine            "````````````````````^```````````````````{}`````\\\\````````````[~]`" +Di2015NewLine            "|``````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the character is in the extension set, it must be precededDi2015NewLine    // with an 'ESC' character whose index is '27' in the Basic Character SetDi2015NewLine    private const int ESC_INDEX = 27;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string StringToGSMHexString(string text, bool delimitWithDash = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Replace \\r\\n with \\r to reduce character countDi2015NewLine        text = text.Replace(Environment.NewLine, "\\r");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use this list to store the index of the character in Di2015NewLine        // the basic/extension character setsDi2015NewLine        var indicies = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var c in text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = BASIC_SET.IndexOf(c);Di2015NewLine            if(index != -1) {Di2015NewLine                indicies.Add(index);Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            index = EXTENSION_SET.IndexOf(c);Di2015NewLine            if(index != -1) {Di2015NewLine                // Add the 'ESC' character index before adding Di2015NewLine                // the extension character indexDi2015NewLine                indicies.Add(ESC_INDEX);Di2015NewLine                indicies.Add(index);Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Convert indicies to 2-digit hexDi2015NewLine      var hex = indicies.Select(i => i.ToString("X2")).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string delimiter = delimitWithDash ? "-" : "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Delimit outputDi2015NewLine      string delimited = string.Join(delimiter, hex);Di2015NewLine      return delimited;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17219039Di2015UniqueSeparatorView
17219039Di2015UniqueSeparatorViewModel
17219039Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ViewModelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public string QueryValue {get ; set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17219039Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult MyMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ViewModel model = new ViewModel();Di2015NewLine    //Get someValue from anywhere.Di2015NewLine    string reqValue = someValue.FirstOrDefault(r => r.field_name.Equals("q15_2013Collections[0][]"));Di2015NewLine    string queryValue = string.Empty();Di2015NewLine    if(queryValues != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       queryValue = string.IsNullOrEmpty(reqValue .field_data)Di2015NewLine                  ? ""Di2015NewLine                  : reqValue .field_data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    model.QueryValue = queryValue ;               Di2015NewLine    return View(model);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17222952Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class UserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        readonly BlockingCollection<User> _queue = new BlockingCollection<User>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var background = Task.Factory.StartNew(process); // Start the processing threads.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make up 50 sample users.Di2015NewLine            var users = Enumerable.Range(0, 50).Select(n => new User{Name = n.ToString()});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var user in users) // Add some sample data.Di2015NewLine                _queue.Add(user);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Press <RETURN> to exit.");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            _queue.CompleteAdding(); // Makes all the consuming foreach loops exit.Di2015NewLine            background.Wait();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Exited.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void process() // Process the input queue,Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int taskCount = 4;  // Let's use 4 threads.Di2015NewLine            var actions = Enumerable.Repeat<Action>(processQueue, taskCount);Di2015NewLine            Parallel.Invoke(actions.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void processQueue()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (User user in _queue.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine                processUser(user);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void processUser(User user)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Processing user " + user.Name);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(200); // Simulate work.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program().run();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17225047Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> AlternateGroups<TSource, TKey>(this IEnumerable<TSource> list, Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var groups = list.GroupBy(keySelector).OrderByDescending(g => g.Count());Di2015NewLine    var largestGroup = groups.First();Di2015NewLine    var arrays = groups.Skip(1).Select(g => g.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    var index = new int[arrays.Count()];Di2015NewLine    foreach(var item in largestGroup)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        var i = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach(var a in arrays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return a[index[i++]++ % a.Length];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17225047Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar input = new[] Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group1", Type = 1 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group2", Type = 2 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group3", Type = 1 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group4", Type = 1 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group5", Type = 1 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group6", Type = 2 },Di2015NewLine    new { Group = "Group7", Type = 3 },Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar results = input.AlternateGroups(x => x.Type);Di2015NewLine// Group1 1 Di2015NewLine// Group2 2 Di2015NewLine// Group7 3 Di2015NewLine// Group3 1 Di2015NewLine// Group6 2 Di2015NewLine// Group7 3 Di2015NewLine// Group4 1 Di2015NewLine// Group2 2 Di2015NewLine// Group7 3 Di2015NewLine// Group5 1 Di2015NewLine// Group6 2 Di2015NewLine// Group7 3 Di2015NewLine

17227342Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<Event> eList = new List<Event>();Di2015NewLine  eList.Add(new Event(new DateTime(2000,1,1),new DateTime(2000,5,1)));Di2015NewLine  eList.Add(new Event(new DateTime(2000,2,1),new DateTime(2000,2,1)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var datelist = eList.Select(item => new { t = "open", d = item.open, s = item.open.Ticks*10 })Di2015NewLine        .Concat(eList.Select(item => new { t = "close", d = item.close, s = (item.close.Ticks*10)+1 }))Di2015NewLine        .OrderBy(item => item.s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var max = datelist.Aggregate(Di2015NewLine            new { curCount = 0, max = 0 },Di2015NewLine            (result,item) => {Di2015NewLine               if (item.t == "open")Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  if (result.max < (result.curCount+1))Di2015NewLine                    return(new { curCount = result.curCount+1, max = result.curCount+1 });Di2015NewLine                  elseDi2015NewLine                    return(new { curCount = result.curCount+1, max = result.max });Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine               elseDi2015NewLine                 return(new { curCount = result.curCount-1, max = result.max });Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            result => result.max);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   max.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DateTime open { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime close { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Event(DateTime inOpen, DateTime inClose)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (inOpen <= inClose)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        open = inOpen;Di2015NewLine        close = inClose;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else throw(new Exception("Can't close at "+inClose.ToShortDateString()+" before you open at "+inOpen.ToShortDateString()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17229594Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string SimplifyTime(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var match = Regex.Match(value, "([0-9]{2})hr:([0-9]{2})min:([0-9]{2})sec");Di2015NewLine    if (!match.Success) return value;Di2015NewLine    int val = int.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    if (val > 0) return val + "hr Ago";Di2015NewLine    val = int.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    if (val > 0) return val + "min Ago";Di2015NewLine    val = int.Parse(match.Groups[3].Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    return val + "sec Ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] values = {Di2015NewLine        "00hr:00min:17sec",Di2015NewLine        "00hr:03min:18sec",Di2015NewLine        "00hr:05min:25sec",Di2015NewLine        "01hr:39min:44sec"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    var converted = Array.ConvertAll(values, SimplifyTime);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17234633Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T> a, b;Di2015NewLineIEqualityComparer<T> cmp = ...Di2015NewLinevar areEqual = !a.Except(b, cmp).Concat(b.Except(c, cmp)).Any();Di2015NewLine

17234633Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CollectionEquals<T>(this ICollection<T> @this, ICollection<T> that,  IEqualityComparer<T> cmp = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // to be equal, the 2 collections must not be null unless they're both null or have the same countDi2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(@this, that)) { return true; }Di2015NewLine    if (@this == null || that == null) { return false; }Di2015NewLine    if (@this.Count != that.Count) { return false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use the default comparer if one wasn't passed inDi2015NewLine    var comparer = cmp ?? EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // to handle duplicates, we convert @this into a "bag" (a mapping Di2015NewLine    // from value -> # occurrences of that value in the collectionDi2015NewLine    var thisDict = @this.GroupBy(t => t, comparer)Di2015NewLine        .ToDictionary(g => g.Key, g => g.Count(), comparer);Di2015NewLine    // do the same for thatDi2015NewLine    var thatDict = @this.GroupBy(t => t, comparer)Di2015NewLine        .ToDictionary(g => g.Key, g => g.Count(), comparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the two collections are equal if they have the same number of distinct valuesDi2015NewLine    return thisDict.Count == thatDict.CountDi2015NewLine        // and if, for each distinct value in @this, that value is also in thatDi2015NewLine        // and has the same number of occurrences in @this and thatDi2015NewLine        && thisDict.All(kvp => thatDict.ContainsKey(kvp.Key) Di2015NewLine                        && thatDict[kvp.Key] == kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17235142Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] Demungify(byte[] value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<byte>(value.Length);Di2015NewLine    bool xor = false;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < value.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte b = value[i];Di2015NewLine        if (xor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b ^= 0x20;Di2015NewLine            xor = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (b == 0x7D)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xor = true; // xor the following byteDi2015NewLine            continue; // skip this byteDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.Add(b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17237578Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int startingTTL = 100;Di2015NewLineconst string delimiter = "%";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile(true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String[] path =  queue.pop().Split(delimiter.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine    int ttl = path.Length > 1?--int.Parse(path[1]):startingTTL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(process(path[0]))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Good!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (ttl > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.pushback(string.Format("{0}{1}{2}", path[0], delimiter,ttl));             Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("TTL expired for path: {0}" path[0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17237578Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile(true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String[] path =  queue.pop().Split(delimiter.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine        int ttl = path.Length > 1?--int.Parse(path[1]):startingTTL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(process(path[0]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Good!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (ttl > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.pushback(string.Format("{0}{1}{2}", path[0], delimiter,ttl));             Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("TTL expired for path: {0}" path[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(InvalidOperationException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Queue.Dequeue throws InvalidOperation if the queue is empty... sleep for a bit before trying againDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17243523Di2015UniqueSeparatorSid's map and copy
17243523Di2015UniqueSeparator[outStream] <== [tailBuf] <== [mainBuf] <== [inStream]
17243523Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] CopyStreamExtractLastBytes(Stream inStream, Stream outStream,Di2015NewLine                                         int extractByteCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //var mainBuf = new byte[1024*4]; // 4K buffer ok for network tooDi2015NewLine    var mainBuf = new byte[4651]; // nearby prime for testingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int mainBufValidCount;Di2015NewLine    var tailBuf = new byte[extractByteCount];Di2015NewLine    int tailBufValidCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ((mainBufValidCount = inStream.Read(mainBuf, 0, mainBuf.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Map: how much of what (passthru/tail) lives where (MainBuf/tailBuf)Di2015NewLine        // more than tail is passthruDi2015NewLine        int totalPassthruCount = Math.Max(0, tailBufValidCount + Di2015NewLine                                    mainBufValidCount - extractByteCount);Di2015NewLine        int tailBufPassthruCount = Math.Min(tailBufValidCount, totalPassthruCount);Di2015NewLine        int tailBufTailCount = tailBufValidCount - tailBufPassthruCount;Di2015NewLine        int mainBufPassthruCount = totalPassthruCount - tailBufPassthruCount;Di2015NewLine        int mainBufResidualCount = mainBufValidCount - mainBufPassthruCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy: Passthru must be flushed per FIFO order (tailBuf then mainBuf)Di2015NewLine        outStream.Write(tailBuf, 0, tailBufPassthruCount);Di2015NewLine        outStream.Write(mainBuf, 0, mainBufPassthruCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy: Now reassemble/compact tail into tailBufDi2015NewLine        var tempResidualBuf = new byte[extractByteCount];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(tailBuf, tailBufPassthruCount, tempResidualBuf, 0, Di2015NewLine                      tailBufTailCount);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(mainBuf, mainBufPassthruCount, tempResidualBuf, Di2015NewLine                      tailBufTailCount, mainBufResidualCount);Di2015NewLine        tailBufValidCount = tailBufTailCount + mainBufResidualCount;Di2015NewLine        tailBuf = tempResidualBuf;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return tailBuf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17243571Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<TEntity, bool>> DefaultFilter<TEntity>()Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : IEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   if (typeof(SoftDeleteEntity).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(TEntity)))Di2015NewLine      return DefaultFilterSoftDelete<TEntity>();Di2015NewLine   else return x => true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<TEntity, bool>> DefaultFilterSoftDelete<TEntity>()Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : IEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity));Di2015NewLine    var propertyExpression = Expression.Property(parameterExpression,Di2015NewLine        "IsDeleted");Di2015NewLine    var notExpression = Expression.Not(propertyExpression);Di2015NewLine    var lambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(notExpression,Di2015NewLine        parameterExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lambdaExpression;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17245115Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String ConvertToBase(int num, int nbase)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineString chars = "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// check if we can convert to another baseDi2015NewLineif(nbase < 2 || nbase > chars.Length)Di2015NewLine    return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint r;Di2015NewLineString newNumber = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// in r we have the offset of the char that was converted to the new baseDi2015NewLinewhile(num >= nbase)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    r = num % nbase;Di2015NewLine    newNumber = chars[r] + newNumber;Di2015NewLine    num = num / nbase;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// the last number to convertDi2015NewLinenewNumber = chars[num] + newNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn newNumber;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void UnBlur()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pb.Image = null;Di2015NewLine            pb.SendToBack();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BitmapFilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static bool Conv3x3(Bitmap b, ConvMatrix m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Avoid divide by zero errorsDi2015NewLine            if (0 == m.Factor) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Bitmap bSrc = (Bitmap)b.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // GDI+ still lies to us - the return format is BGR, NOT RGB.Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bmData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, b.Width, b.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bmSrc = bSrc.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bSrc.Width, bSrc.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine            int stride2 = stride * 2;Di2015NewLine            System.IntPtr Scan0 = bmData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine            System.IntPtr SrcScan0 = bmSrc.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            unsafeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte* p = (byte*)(void*)Scan0;Di2015NewLine                byte* pSrc = (byte*)(void*)SrcScan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int nOffset = stride + 6 - b.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine                int nWidth = b.Width - 2;Di2015NewLine                int nHeight = b.Height - 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < nHeight; ++y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int x = 0; x < nWidth; ++x)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        nPixel = ((((pSrc[2] * m.TopLeft) + (pSrc[5] * m.TopMid) + (pSrc[8] * m.TopRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[2 + stride] * m.MidLeft) + (pSrc[5 + stride] * m.Pixel) + (pSrc[8 + stride] * m.MidRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[2 + stride2] * m.BottomLeft) + (pSrc[5 + stride2] * m.BottomMid) + (pSrc[8 + stride2] * m.BottomRight)) / m.Factor) + m.Offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (nPixel < 0) nPixel = 0;Di2015NewLine                        if (nPixel > 255) nPixel = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        p[5 + stride] = (byte)nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        nPixel = ((((pSrc[1] * m.TopLeft) + (pSrc[4] * m.TopMid) + (pSrc[7] * m.TopRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[1 + stride] * m.MidLeft) + (pSrc[4 + stride] * m.Pixel) + (pSrc[7 + stride] * m.MidRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[1 + stride2] * m.BottomLeft) + (pSrc[4 + stride2] * m.BottomMid) + (pSrc[7 + stride2] * m.BottomRight)) / m.Factor) + m.Offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (nPixel < 0) nPixel = 0;Di2015NewLine                        if (nPixel > 255) nPixel = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        p[4 + stride] = (byte)nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        nPixel = ((((pSrc[0] * m.TopLeft) + (pSrc[3] * m.TopMid) + (pSrc[6] * m.TopRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[0 + stride] * m.MidLeft) + (pSrc[3 + stride] * m.Pixel) + (pSrc[6 + stride] * m.MidRight) +Di2015NewLine                            (pSrc[0 + stride2] * m.BottomLeft) + (pSrc[3 + stride2] * m.BottomMid) + (pSrc[6 + stride2] * m.BottomRight)) / m.Factor) + m.Offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (nPixel < 0) nPixel = 0;Di2015NewLine                        if (nPixel > 255) nPixel = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        p[3 + stride] = (byte)nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        p += 3;Di2015NewLine                        pSrc += 3;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    p += nOffset;Di2015NewLine                    pSrc += nOffset;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            b.UnlockBits(bmData);Di2015NewLine            bSrc.UnlockBits(bmSrc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool GaussianBlur(Bitmap b, int nWeight /* default to 4*/)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ConvMatrix m = new ConvMatrix();Di2015NewLine            m.SetAll(1);Di2015NewLine            m.Pixel = nWeight;Di2015NewLine            m.TopMid = m.MidLeft = m.MidRight = m.BottomMid = 2;Di2015NewLine            m.Factor = nWeight + 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return BitmapFilter.Conv3x3(b, m);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class ConvMatrixDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public int TopLeft = 0, TopMid = 0, TopRight = 0;Di2015NewLine            public int MidLeft = 0, Pixel = 1, MidRight = 0;Di2015NewLine            public int BottomLeft = 0, BottomMid = 0, BottomRight = 0;Di2015NewLine            public int Factor = 1;Di2015NewLine            public int Offset = 0;Di2015NewLine            public void SetAll(int nVal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TopLeft = TopMid = TopRight = MidLeft = Pixel = MidRight = BottomLeft = BottomMid = BottomRight = nVal;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ScreenshotDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Bitmap 17256991Di2015UniqueSeparatorLockBitmap
17256991Di2015UniqueSeparatorLockBitmap
17256991Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] data = new WebClient().DownloadData("http://srv2.jpg.co.il/1/51c616787a3fa.png");Di2015NewLine    Image image = Image.FromStream(new MemoryStream(data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LockBitmap bitmap = new LockBitmap(new Bitmap(image));Di2015NewLine    // this essentially copies the data into memory and copies from a pointer to an arrayDi2015NewLine    bitmap.LockBits();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Color black = Color.FromArgb(0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    Color white = Color.FromArgb(255, 255, 255);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < bitmap.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < bitmap.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // GetPixel is a nice abstraction the author in the Article created so we don't have to do any of the gritty stuff.Di2015NewLine            if (bitmap.GetPixel(x, y) == black)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bitmap.GetPixel(x + 8, y) == black && bitmap.GetPixel(x + 8, y + 3) == white)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("White Ball Found in {0}", stopwatch.Elapsed.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bitmap.UnlockBits(); // copies the data from the array back to the original pointerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.Read();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17256991Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int y = 0; y < bitmap.Height; y += 3) // As we know the radius of the ballDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < bitmap.Width; x += 3) // We can increase thisDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bitmap.GetPixel(x, y) == black && bitmap.GetPixel(x, y + 3) == white)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("White Ball Found ({0},{1}) in {2}", x, y, stopwatch.Elapsed.ToString());Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17258816Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task Delay(int millisecondsDelay, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (millisecondsDelay < -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("millisecondsDelay", Environment.GetResourceString("Task_Delay_InvalidMillisecondsDelay"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (cancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return FromCancellation(cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (millisecondsDelay == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CompletedTask;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    DelayPromise state = new DelayPromise(cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine    if (cancellationToken.CanBeCanceled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        state.Registration = cancellationToken.InternalRegisterWithoutEC(delegate (object state) {Di2015NewLine            ((DelayPromise) state).Complete();Di2015NewLine        }, state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (millisecondsDelay != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        state.Timer = new Timer(delegate (object state) {Di2015NewLine            ((DelayPromise) state).Complete();Di2015NewLine        }, state, millisecondsDelay, -1);Di2015NewLine        state.Timer.KeepRootedWhileScheduled();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return state;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17260033Di2015UniqueSeparator    1)using fixed size messages . like we will send only 100 bytes . Di2015NewLine      and we will        receive only 100 bytesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    2)dinamic way . size of message ,then the message itself . Di2015NewLine      like we will send [message.length][message] then on opposite sideDi2015NewLine      we will receive the size message then read entire message Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    3) using marker . we will send message with end marker Di2015NewLine       (for example \\n in our case) Di2015NewLine      we will use stream to read entire message sent to us till reaching that marker . Di2015NewLine      and most stream has readline() that will read till reaching \\nDi2015NewLine

17260319Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Attach(City entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (entity != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Attach(entity.Country);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            AttachAndMarkAs(entity, entity.EntityState ??
