EntityState.Added, instance => instance.Id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17260319Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void AttachAndMarkAs<T>(T entity, EntityState state, Func<T, object> id) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var entry = Entry(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (entry.State == EntityState.Detached)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var set = Set<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            T attachedEntity = set.Find(id(entity));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (attachedEntity != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var attachedEntry = Entry(attachedEntity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                attachedEntry.CurrentValues.SetValues(entity);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                entry.State = state;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17260476Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Texture2D CreateRoundedRectangleTexture(GraphicsDevice graphics, int width, int height, int borderThickness, int borderRadius, int borderShadow, List<Color> backgroundColors, List<Color> borderColors, float initialShadowIntensity, float finalShadowIntensity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (backgroundColors == null || backgroundColors.Count == 0) throw new ArgumentException("Must define at least one background color (up to four).");Di2015NewLine    if (borderColors == null || borderColors.Count == 0) throw new ArgumentException("Must define at least one border color (up to three).");Di2015NewLine    if (borderRadius < 1) throw new ArgumentException("Must define a border radius (rounds off edges).");Di2015NewLine    if (borderThickness < 1) throw new ArgumentException("Must define border thikness.");Di2015NewLine    if (borderThickness + borderRadius > height / 2 || borderThickness + borderRadius > width / 2) throw new ArgumentException("Border will be too thick and/or rounded to fit on the texture.");Di2015NewLine    if (borderShadow > borderRadius) throw new ArgumentException("Border shadow must be lesser in magnitude than the border radius (suggeted: shadow <= 0.25 * radius).");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Texture2D texture = new Texture2D(graphics, width, height, false, SurfaceFormat.Color);Di2015NewLine    Color[] color = new Color[width * height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < texture.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < texture.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (backgroundColors.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 4:Di2015NewLine                    Color leftColor0 = Color.Lerp(backgroundColors[0], backgroundColors[1], ((float)y / (width - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    Color rightColor0 = Color.Lerp(backgroundColors[2], backgroundColors[3], ((float)y / (height - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    color[x + width * y] = Color.Lerp(leftColor0, rightColor0, ((float)x / (width - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 3:Di2015NewLine                    Color leftColor1 = Color.Lerp(backgroundColors[0], backgroundColors[1], ((float)y / (width - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    Color rightColor1 = Color.Lerp(backgroundColors[1], backgroundColors[2], ((float)y / (height - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    color[x + width * y] = Color.Lerp(leftColor1, rightColor1, ((float)x / (width - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 2:Di2015NewLine                    color[x + width * y] = Color.Lerp(backgroundColors[0], backgroundColors[1], ((float)x / (width - 1)));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    color[x + width * y] = backgroundColors[0];Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            color[x + width * y] = ColorBorder(x, y, width, height, borderThickness, borderRadius, borderShadow, color[x + width * y], borderColors, initialShadowIntensity, finalShadowIntensity);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    texture.SetData<Color>(color);Di2015NewLine    return texture;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Color ColorBorder(int x, int y, int width, int height, int borderThickness, int borderRadius, int borderShadow, Color initialColor, List<Color> borderColors, float initialShadowIntensity, float finalShadowIntensity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rectangle internalRectangle = new Rectangle((borderThickness + borderRadius), (borderThickness + borderRadius), width - 2 * (borderThickness + borderRadius), height - 2 * (borderThickness + borderRadius));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (internalRectangle.Contains(x, y)) return initialColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector2 origin = Vector2.Zero;Di2015NewLine    Vector2 point = new Vector2(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (x < borderThickness + borderRadius)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (y < borderRadius + borderThickness)Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(borderRadius + borderThickness, borderRadius + borderThickness);Di2015NewLine        else if (y > height - (borderRadius + borderThickness))Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(borderRadius + borderThickness, height - (borderRadius + borderThickness));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(borderRadius + borderThickness, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (x > width - (borderRadius + borderThickness))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (y < borderRadius + borderThickness)Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(width - (borderRadius + borderThickness), borderRadius + borderThickness);Di2015NewLine        else if (y > height - (borderRadius + borderThickness))Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(width - (borderRadius + borderThickness), height - (borderRadius + borderThickness));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(width - (borderRadius + borderThickness), y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (y < borderRadius + borderThickness)Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(x, borderRadius + borderThickness);Di2015NewLine        else if (y > height - (borderRadius + borderThickness))Di2015NewLine            origin = new Vector2(x, height - (borderRadius + borderThickness));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!origin.Equals(Vector2.Zero))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float distance = Vector2.Distance(point, origin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (distance > borderRadius + borderThickness + 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Color.Transparent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (distance > borderRadius + 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (borderColors.Count > 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                float modNum = distance - borderRadius;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (modNum < borderThickness / 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return Color.Lerp(borderColors[2], borderColors[1], (float)((modNum) / (borderThickness / 2.0)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return Color.Lerp(borderColors[1], borderColors[0], (float)((modNum - (borderThickness / 2.0)) / (borderThickness / 2.0)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (borderColors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                return borderColors[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (distance > borderRadius - borderShadow + 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float mod = (distance - (borderRadius - borderShadow)) / borderShadow;Di2015NewLine            float shadowDiff = initialShadowIntensity - finalShadowIntensity;Di2015NewLine            return DarkenColor(initialColor, ((shadowDiff * mod) + finalShadowIntensity));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return initialColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Color DarkenColor(Color color, float shadowIntensity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Color.Lerp(color, Color.Black, shadowIntensity);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17261384Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring str = " - wr";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string ToJsonString(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var enumerator = StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator(s);Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var unicodeChar = enumerator.GetTextElement();Di2015NewLine        var codePoint = char.ConvertToUtf32(unicodeChar, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (codePoint < 0x80) {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(unicodeChar);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (codePoint < 0xffff) {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\\\u").Append(codePoint.ToString("x4"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\\\u").Append((codePoint & 0xffff).ToString("x4"));Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\\\u").Append(((codePoint >> 16) & 0xffff).ToString("x4"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17262692Di2015UniqueSeparator// global success indicatorDi2015NewLineprivate const int NotDone = 0;Di2015NewLineprivate const int AllDone = 1;Di2015NewLineprivate int _allDone = NotDone;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate GeneralSearchFunction(bool directionForward) {Di2015NewLine  bool iFoundIt = false;Di2015NewLine  ... do some search operations that won't take much timeDi2015NewLine  if (iFoundIt) {Di2015NewLine    // set _allDone to AllDone!Di2015NewLine    Interlocked.Exchange(ref _allDone, AllDone);Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ... do more workDi2015NewLine  // after one or a few iterations, if this thread is still goingDi2015NewLine  //   see if another thread has set _allDone to AllDoneDi2015NewLine  if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref _allDone, NotDone, NotDone) == AllDone) {Di2015NewLine    return; // if they did, then exitDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ... loop to the top and carry on workingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// main thread:Di2015NewLine  Thread t1 = new Thread(() => GeneralSearchFunction(true));Di2015NewLine  Thread t2 = new Thread(() => GeneralSearchFunction(false));Di2015NewLine  t1.Start(); t2.Start(); // start bothDi2015NewLine  t1.Join(); t2.Join(); Di2015NewLine  // when this gets to here, one of them will have succeededDi2015NewLine
17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // global success indicatorDi2015NewLine    private const int NotDone = 0;Di2015NewLine    private const int AllDone = 1;Di2015NewLine    private static int _allDone = NotDone;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int _forwardsCount = 0;    // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    private static int _backwardsCount = 0;   // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var searchItem = "foo";Di2015NewLine        Thread t1 = new Thread(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchForwards, searchItem));Di2015NewLine        Thread t2 = new Thread(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchBackwards, searchItem));Di2015NewLine        t1.Start(); t2.Start();Di2015NewLine        t1.Join(); t2.Join();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("all done");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void DoSearchWithBarrier(Func<string, bool> searchMethod, string searchItem) {Di2015NewLine        while (!searchMethod(searchItem)) {Di2015NewLine            // after one or a few iterations, if this thread is still goingDi2015NewLine            //   see if another thread has set _allDone to AllDoneDi2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref _allDone, NotDone, NotDone) == AllDone) {Di2015NewLine                return; // if they did, then exitDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref _allDone, AllDone);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool SearchForwards(string item) {Di2015NewLine        //  return true if we "found it", false if notDi2015NewLine        return (Interlocked.Increment(ref _forwardsCount) == 10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool SearchBackwards(string item) {Di2015NewLine        //  return true if we "found it", false if notDi2015NewLine        return (Interlocked.Increment(ref _backwardsCount) == 20); // make this less than 10 to find it backwards firstDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static int _forwardsCount = 0;    // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    private static int _backwardsCount = 0;   // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var searchItem = "foo";Di2015NewLine        var tokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        var allDone = tokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLine        Task t1 = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchForwards, searchItem, tokenSource, allDone), allDone);Di2015NewLine        Task t2 = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchBackwards, searchItem, tokenSource, allDone), allDone);Di2015NewLine        Task.WaitAll(new[] {t2, t2});Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("all done");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void DoSearchWithBarrier(Func<string, bool> searchMethod, string searchItem, CancellationTokenSource tokenSource, CancellationToken allDone) {Di2015NewLine        while (!searchMethod(searchItem)) {Di2015NewLine            if (allDone.IsCancellationRequested) {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoSearchWithBarrier
17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine    private static int _forwardsCount = 0;    // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    private static int _backwardsCount = 0;   // counters to simulate a "find"Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        Barrier barrier = new Barrier(numThreads, Di2015NewLine            b => Console.WriteLine("Completed search iteration {0}", b.CurrentPhaseNumber));Di2015NewLine        var searchItem = "foo";Di2015NewLine        Thread t1 = new Thread(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchForwards, searchItem, barrier));Di2015NewLine        Thread t2 = new Thread(() => DoSearchWithBarrier(SearchBackwards, searchItem, barrier));Di2015NewLine        t1.Start(); Console.WriteLine("Started t1");Di2015NewLine        t2.Start(); Console.WriteLine("Started t2");Di2015NewLine        t1.Join(); Console.WriteLine("t1 done");Di2015NewLine        t2.Join(); Console.WriteLine("t2 done");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("all done");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void DoSearchWithBarrier(Func<string, bool> searchMethod, string searchItem, Barrier barrier) {Di2015NewLine        while (!searchMethod(searchItem)) {Di2015NewLine            // while we haven't found it, wait for the other thread to catch upDi2015NewLine            barrier.SignalAndWait(); // check for the other thread AFTER the barrierDi2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref _allDone, NotDone, NotDone) == AllDone) {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // set success signal on this thread BEFORE the barrierDi2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref _allDone, AllDone);Di2015NewLine        // wait for the other thread, and then exit (and it will too)Di2015NewLine        barrier.SignalAndWait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorManualResetEvent

17262692Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate ManualResetEvent _mreAllDone = new ManualResetEvent(true); // will not block a threadDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine  if (iFoundIt) {Di2015NewLine    _mreAllDone.Reset(); // stop other threads proceedingDi2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine  //   see if another thread has reset _mreAllDone by testing with a 0 timeoutDi2015NewLine  if (!_mreAllDone.WaitOne(0)) {Di2015NewLine      return; // if they did, then exitDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

17263012Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Normalize<T>(List<T> elements, Func<T, double> getter, Action<T, double> setter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double fMin = elements.Min(getter);Di2015NewLine    double fMax = elements.Max(getter);Di2015NewLine    double fDelta = fMax - fMin;Di2015NewLine    double fInv = 1.0d / fDelta;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < elements.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T t = elements[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double initialValue = getter(t);Di2015NewLine        double newValue = (initialValue - fMin) * fInv;Di2015NewLine        setter(t, newValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17264480Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A System.Attribute which is also an IDictionary, useful for adding extension data to Di2015NewLine/// individual objects, no matter the typeDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class ExtensionDataAttribute : System.Attribute, IDictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The dictionary wrapped by this collection, which cannot extend by System.Attribute and Dictionary at onceDi2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, object> data = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Adds this collection of extension data to the specified object; should be called only onceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="o">The object to which to add this collection of extension data</param>Di2015NewLine    public void AddTo(object o) {Di2015NewLine        System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes(o, this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Following are encapsulated calls to the wrapped dictionary, which should need no explanation; Di2015NewLine    // after accessing an ExtensionDataAttribute instance, simply use it as an IDictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(string key, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ContainsKey(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.ContainsKey(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ICollection<string> KeysDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return data.Keys; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryGetValue(string key, out object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.TryGetValue(key, out value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ICollection<object> ValuesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return data.Values; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object this[string key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return data[key];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[key] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(KeyValuePair<string, object> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Contains(KeyValuePair<string, object> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.Contains(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CopyTo(KeyValuePair<string, object>[] array, int arrayIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data.CopyTo(array, arrayIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return data.Count; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsReadOnlyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return data.IsReadOnly; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(KeyValuePair<string, object> item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<string, object>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return data.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionDataAttributeExtensions {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SetExtensionDataAttributeValue(this object o, string name, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name)) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(o))Di2015NewLine            if (a is ExtensionDataAttribute)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ((ExtensionDataAttribute)a)[name] = value;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ExtensionDataAttribute extensionData = new ExtensionDataAttribute();Di2015NewLine        extensionData[name] = value;Di2015NewLine        extensionData.AddTo(o);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T GetExtensionDataAttributeValue<T>(this object o, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name)) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(o))Di2015NewLine            if (a is ExtensionDataAttribute)Di2015NewLine                return (T)((ExtensionDataAttribute)a)[name];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object GetExtensionDataAttributeValue(this object o, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name)) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(o))Di2015NewLine            if (a is ExtensionDataAttribute)Di2015NewLine                return ((ExtensionDataAttribute)a)[name];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RemoveExtensionDataAttributeValue(this object o, }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17264480Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Extension methods showing samples of using the ExtensionDataAttribute class directly, for use Di2015NewLine/// in situations where it is undesirable to include the extension methods provided with that classDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionMethodsExample1 {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Adds a description to the specified string objectDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="s">The string to describe</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="description">The description to set</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void SetDescription(this string s, string description) {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(description))Di2015NewLine            description = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(s))Di2015NewLine            if (a is ExtensionDataAttribute) {Di2015NewLine                ((ExtensionDataAttribute)a)["Description"] = description;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ExtensionDataAttribute extensionData = new ExtensionDataAttribute();Di2015NewLine        extensionData["Description"] = description;Di2015NewLine        extensionData.AddTo(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the description for the specified string, if it has one; Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="s"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription(this string s) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute a in System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(s))Di2015NewLine            if (a is ExtensionDataAttribute) {Di2015NewLine                ExtensionDataAttribute eda = (ExtensionDataAttribute)a;Di2015NewLine                if (eda.ContainsKey("Description"))Di2015NewLine                    return eda["Description"].ToString();Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    return "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Extension methods encapsulating calls to extension methods provided with the ExtensionDataAttribute Di2015NewLine/// class, demonstrating increased ease of implementing one's own extension dataDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionMethodsExample2 {Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription(this string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s.GetExtensionDataAttributeValue<string>("Description");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SetDescription(this string s, string description)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s.SetExtensionDataAttributeValue("Description", description);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17270383Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct CHARRANGEDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public int cpMin;Di2015NewLine   public int cpMax;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct NMHDRDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public IntPtr hwndFrom;Di2015NewLine   public IntPtr idFrom;Di2015NewLine   public int code;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct ENLINKDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public NMHDR nmhdr;Di2015NewLine   public int msg;Di2015NewLine   public IntPtr wParam;Di2015NewLine   public IntPtr lParam;Di2015NewLine   public CHARRANGE chrg;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // ... other code ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      const int WM_NOTIFY    = 0x004E;Di2015NewLine      const int EN_LINK      = 0x070B;Di2015NewLine      const int WM_SETCURSOR = 0x0020;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (m.Msg == WM_NOTIFY)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         NMHDR nmhdr = (NMHDR)m.GetLParam(typeof(NMHDR));Di2015NewLine         if (nmhdr.code == EN_LINK)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            ENLINK enlink = (ENLINK)m.GetLParam(typeof(ENLINK));Di2015NewLine            if (enlink.msg == WM_SETCURSOR)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Set the result to indicate this message has been handled,Di2015NewLine                // and return without calling the default window procedure.Di2015NewLine                m.Result = (IntPtr)1;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17270383Di2015UniqueSeparatorrtb
17270383Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   const int WM_NOTIFY    = 0x004E;Di2015NewLine   const int EN_LINK      = 0x070B;Di2015NewLine   const int WM_SETCURSOR = 0x0020;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (m.Msg == WM_NOTIFY)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      NMHDR nmhdr = (NMHDR)m.GetLParam(typeof(NMHDR));Di2015NewLine      if (nmhdr.code == EN_LINK)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         ENLINK enlink = (ENLINK)m.GetLParam(typeof(ENLINK));Di2015NewLine         if (enlink.msg == WM_SETCURSOR)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Get the position of the last line of text in the RichTextBox.Di2015NewLine            Point ptLastLine = rtb.GetPositionFromCharIndex(rtb.TextLength);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // That point was in client coordinates, so convert it toDi2015NewLine            // screen coordinates so that we can match it against theDi2015NewLine            // position of the mouse pointer.Di2015NewLine            ptLastLine = rtb.PointToScreen(ptLastLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Determine the height of a line of text in the RichTextBox.Di2015NewLine            // Di2015NewLine            // For this simple demo, it doesn't matter which line we use forDi2015NewLine            // this since they all use the same size and style. However, youDi2015NewLine            // cannot generally rely on this being the case.Di2015NewLine            Size szTextLine = TextRenderer.MeasureText(rtb.Lines[0], rtb.Font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Then add that text height to the vertical position of theDi2015NewLine            // last line of text in the RichTextBox.Di2015NewLine            ptLastLine.Y += szTextLine.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now that we know the maximum height of all lines of text in theDi2015NewLine            // RichTextBox, we can compare that to the pointer position.Di2015NewLine            if (Cursor.Position.Y > ptLastLine.Y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               // If the mouse pointer is beyond the last line of text,Di2015NewLine               // do not treat it as a hyperlink.Di2015NewLine               m.Result = (IntPtr)1;Di2015NewLine               return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17274220Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double SinDistribution(Di2015NewLine    double value,Di2015NewLine    double lowToHighMeanPoint = 0.0,Di2015NewLine    double length = 10.0,Di2015NewLine    double low = -1.0,Di2015NewLine    double high = 1.0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var amplitude = (high - low) / 2;Di2015NewLine    var mean = low + amplitude;Di2015NewLine    return mean + (amplitude * Math.Sin(Di2015NewLine        (((value - lowToHighMeanPoint) % length) / length) * 2 * Math.PI));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17274220Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (double i = 0.0; i < 24.0; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", i, SinDistribution(i, 6.5, 24.0, -6.0, 35.0));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17274220Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble EstimatedTemperature(double hour, double[] distribution)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var low = Math.Floor(hour);Di2015NewLine    var lowIndex = (int)low;Di2015NewLine    var highIndex = (int)Math.Ceiling(hour);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (highIndex > distribution.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       highIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (lowIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lowIndex = distribution.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lowValue = distribution.ElementAt(lowIndex);Di2015NewLine    var highValue = distribution.ElementAt(highIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lowValue + ((hour - low) * (highValue - lowValue));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

SocketConnectionClosed(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("WebSocketConnection was terminated!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void 17296220Di2015UniqueSeparator public class DeltaGeIODi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This constant string is used as a "salt" value for the PasswordDeriveBytes function calls.Di2015NewLine    // This size of the IV (in bytes) must = (keysize / 8).  Default keysize is 256, so the IV must beDi2015NewLine    // 32 bytes long.  Using a 16 character string here gives us 32 bytes when converted to a byte array.Di2015NewLine    private const string initVector = "aa00bb11cc22dd33";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This constant is used to determine the keysize of the encryption algorithm.Di2015NewLine    private const int keysize = 256;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string debug;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string cryptDecryptScript(string nameFileToCrypt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string prova = writeVBScriptEncrypt(nameFileToCrypt, "");Di2015NewLine            prova = writeVBScriptDecrypt("testCrypt.txt");Di2015NewLine            return prova;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return debug;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string writeVBScriptEncrypt(string nameFile, string nameScript)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = System.IO.File.ReadAllBytes(nameFile);Di2015NewLine        byte[] encryptedBytes = this.EncryptBytes(bytes, "test");Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            File.Delete("testCrypt.txt");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            debug = "WVBSSE - i cannot delete testCrypt.txt file";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.WriteAllBytes("testCrypt.txt", encryptedBytes);Di2015NewLine        return "OK file Encrypted";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string writeVBScriptDecrypt(string nameFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       var encryptedBytes = File.ReadAllBytes(nameFile);Di2015NewLine       byte[] decryptedBytes = this.DecryptBytes(encryptedBytes, "test");Di2015NewLine       System.IO.File.WriteAllBytes("testDecrypt.vbs", decryptedBytes);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.IO.File.Delete("testCrypt.txt");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            debug = "WVBSSD - i cannot delete testCrypt.txt file";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "OK file Decrypted";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] EncryptBytes(byte[] plainText, string passPhrase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine       byte[] plainTextBytes = plainText;Di2015NewLine       PasswordDeriveBytes password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(passPhrase, null);Di2015NewLine       byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keysize / 8);Di2015NewLine       using (RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged() { Mode = CipherMode.CBC})Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          using (ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine          using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine          using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine             cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine             byte[] cipherTextBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine             return cipherTextBytes;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] DecryptBytes(byte[] cipherText, string passPhrase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] cipherTextBytes = cipherText;Di2015NewLine        PasswordDeriveBytes password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(passPhrase, null);Di2015NewLine        byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keysize / 8);Di2015NewLine        using (RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged(){Mode = CipherMode.CBC})Di2015NewLine        using (ICryptoTransform decryptor = symmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(cipherTextBytes))Di2015NewLine        using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           byte[] buffer = new byte[cipherTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLine           int decryptedByteCount = cryptoStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine           byte[] copy = new byte[decryptedByteCount];Di2015NewLine           Array.Copy(buffer, copy, decryptedByteCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           return copy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17296239Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap CombineImages(Bitmap bmp_1, Bitmap bmp_2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (bmp_1.Width == bmp_2.Width)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bmp_1_Height, bmpWidth, bmp_2_Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmpWidth = bmp_1.Width;Di2015NewLine        bmp_1_Height = bmp_1.Height;Di2015NewLine        bmp_2_Height = bmp_2.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color c;Di2015NewLine        bool notFound = false;Di2015NewLine        int firstMatchedRow = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[,] bmp2_first2rows = new byte[3 * bmpWidth, 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int b = 0; b < 2; b++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int a = 0; a < bmpWidth; a++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                c = bmp_2.GetPixel(a, b);Di2015NewLine                bmp2_first2rows[a * 3, b] = c.R;Di2015NewLine                bmp2_first2rows[a * 3 + 1, b] = c.G;Di2015NewLine                bmp2_first2rows[a * 3 + 2, b] = c.B;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < bmp_1_Height - 1; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int x = 0; x < bmpWidth; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    c = bmp_1.GetPixel(x, y + j);Di2015NewLine                    if ((bmp2_first2rows[x * 3, j] == c.R) &&Di2015NewLine                        (bmp2_first2rows[x * 3 + 1, j] == c.G) &&Di2015NewLine                        (bmp2_first2rows[x * 3 + 2, j] == c.B))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        notFound = true;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (notFound)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!notFound)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                firstMatchedRow = y;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                notFound = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (firstMatchedRow > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(bmpWidth, firstMatchedRow + bmp_2_Height);Di2015NewLine            Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine            Rectangle RectDst = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmpWidth, firstMatchedRow);Di2015NewLine            Rectangle RectSrc;Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(bmp_1, RectDst, RectDst, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine            RectDst = new Rectangle(0, firstMatchedRow, bmpWidth, bmp_2_Height);Di2015NewLine            RectSrc = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmpWidth, bmp_2_Height);Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(bmp_2, RectDst, RectSrc, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine            return bmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17312897Di2015UniqueSeparator/*=====================================Atan2=====================================Di2015NewLine**Di2015NewLine==============================================================================*/Di2015NewLineFCIMPL2_VV(double, COMDouble::Atan2, double x, double y) Di2015NewLine    WRAPPER_CONTRACT;Di2015NewLine    STATIC_CONTRACT_SO_TOLERANT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the intrinsic for Atan2 does not produce Nan for Atan2(+-inf,+-inf)Di2015NewLine    if (IS_DBL_INFINITY(x) && IS_DBL_INFINITY(y)) {Di2015NewLine        return(x / y);      // create a NaNDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (double) atan2(x, y);Di2015NewLineFCIMPLENDDi2015NewLine

17319421Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void WeekendDays_Button_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.SelectWeekEnds():Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SelectWeekEnds(){Di2015NewLine        //If you need to get the selected date from calendarDi2015NewLine        //DateTime dt = this.Calendar1.SelectedDate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If you need to get the current date from todayDi2015NewLine        DateTime dt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<DateTime> weekendDays = this.SelectedWeekEnds(dt);Di2015NewLine        weekendDays.ForEach(d => this.Calendar1.SelectedDates.Add(d));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<DateTime> GetWeekEndDays(DateTime DT){Di2015NewLine        List<DateTime> result = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLine        int month = DT.Month;Di2015NewLine        DT = DT.AddDays(-DT.Day+1);//Sets DT to first day of monthDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Sets DT to the first week-end day of the month;Di2015NewLine        if(DT.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine            while (DT.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine                DT = DT.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Adds the week-end day and stops when next month is reached.Di2015NewLine        while (DT.Month == month)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(DT);Di2015NewLine            DT = DT.AddDays(DT.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday ? 1 : 6);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17323015Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrentKeyboardState
17323015Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (isSaveBox)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Get the current keyboard state and keys that are pressedDi2015NewLine    KeyboardState keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();Di2015NewLine    Keys[] keys = keyboardState.GetPressedKeys();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Keys currentKey in keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (currentKey != Keys.None)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //If we have pressed the same key twice, wait atleast 125ms before adding it againDi2015NewLine            if (lastKeys.Contains(currentKey))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((gameTime.TotalGameTime.TotalMilliseconds - timer > 125))Di2015NewLine                    HandleKey(gameTime, currentKey);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //If we press a new key, add itDi2015NewLine            else if (!lastKeys.Contains(currentKey))Di2015NewLine                HandleKey(gameTime, currentKey);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Save the last keys and pressed keys arrayDi2015NewLine    lastKeyboardState = keyboardState;Di2015NewLine    lastKeys = keys;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17323015Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void HandleKey(GameTime gameTime, Keys currentKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string keyString = currentKey.ToString();Di2015NewLine    if (currentKey == Keys.Space)Di2015NewLine        levelName += " ";Di2015NewLine    else if ((currentKey == Keys.Back || currentKey == Keys.Delete) && levelName.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        levelName = levelName.Remove(levelName.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    else if (currentKey == Keys.Enter)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        levelName += keyString;Di2015NewLine    //Set the timer to the current timeDi2015NewLine    timer = gameTime.TotalGameTime.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17325303Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    private List<string> list1 = new List<string> { "a", "b" };Di2015NewLine    private List<string> list2 = new List<string> { "c", "d" };Di2015NewLine    private List<string> list3 = new List<string> { "e", "f", "g" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Next()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int indexList3 = index % list3.Count;Di2015NewLine        int indexList2 = (index / list3.Count) % list2.Count;Di2015NewLine        int indexList1 = (index / (list2.Count * list3.Count)) % list1.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IncrementIndex();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list1[indexList1] + list2[indexList2] + list3[indexList3];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void IncrementIndex()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        index++;Di2015NewLine        if (index > list1.Count*list2.Count*list3.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17325609Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT TOP (100) PERCENT Accounting.TopicA.CodeA,Di2015NewLineSUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Debit) AS DEB,Di2015NewLineSUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Credit) AS CRED,Di2015NewLineCASE WHEN SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Credit) - SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Debit) < 0Di2015NewLineTHEN SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Debit) - SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Credit)Di2015NewLineELSE 0 END AS NEG,Di2015NewLineCASE WHEN SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Credit) - SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Debit) > 0Di2015NewLineTHEN SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Credit) - SUM(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Debit)Di2015NewLineELSE 0 AS POS,Di2015NewLineAccounting.TopicA.DescriptionDi2015NewLineFROM Accounting.TopicA Di2015NewLineINNER JOIN Accounting.DocumentDetail Di2015NewLineON Accounting.TopicA.CodeA = SUBSTRING(Accounting.DocumentDetail.Topic, 1, 2)Di2015NewLineGROUP BY Accounting.TopicA.CodeA, Accounting.TopicA.DescriptionDi2015NewLineORDER BY Accounting.TopicA.CodeADi2015NewLine

17328215Di2015UniqueSeparatorALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[BusinessHours]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine@meeting_date DATETIMEDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @meeting_day DATETIMEDi2015NewLineDECLARE @meeting_time DATETIMEDi2015NewLineDECLARE @submit_day DATETIME;Di2015NewLineDECLARE @submit_time DATETIME;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @start_time_of_business_day DATETIME;Di2015NewLineDECLARE @business_day_hours FLOAT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @num1 FLOATDi2015NewLineDECLARE @num2 FLOATDi2015NewLineDECLARE @num3 FLOATDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @meeting_day = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),@meeting_date,101);Di2015NewLineSET @meeting_time =  CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),@meeting_date,108);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @submit_day = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),101);Di2015NewLineSET @submit_time =  CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),108);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @start_time_of_business_day = '09:00';Di2015NewLineSET @business_day_hours = 8.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @num1 = ((DATEDIFF(dd, @submit_day, @meeting_day))Di2015NewLine-(DATEDIFF(wk, @submit_day, @meeting_day) * 2)Di2015NewLine-(CASE WHEN DATEPART(dw, @submit_day) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)Di2015NewLine-(CASE WHEN DATEPART(dw, @meeting_day) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)Di2015NewLine-(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bank_holiday WHERE the_date BETWEEN @submit_day AND @meeting_day)) * @business_day_hoursDi2015NewLineSET @num2 = (select datediff(minute, @start_time_of_business_day, @submit_time)) / 60.0Di2015NewLineSET @num3 = (select datediff(minute, @start_time_of_business_day, @meeting_time)) / 60.0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineselect @num1 - @num2 + @num3 as [hours]Di2015NewLine
